fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:
- Common Agricultural Policy (CAP) 
- Pesticides regulation (Registration and Sustainable Use Directive) 
- Environment & Trade (Maximum Residue Limits) 
- GMO's (import and cultivation approvals) 
- Council Regulation (EC) No 479/2008 of 29 April 2008 on the common organisation of the market in wine products.
goals__remit: To help agribusiness companies improve their understanding of the policy context that impact their businesses and strategies.
relevant_communication: Mainly 1 to 1 meetings with MEP's and their staff.
